Quests.Name: forest_discovery
Quests.Title: Forest Discovery
Quests.Description: Maru has asked you to check out the forest east of the bath house that was unblocked after the latest rainstorm.
Quests.Objective: Walk into the mushroom forest east of the bath house

Quests.Name: first_rebuild1
Quests.Title: First Villager Rebuild
Quests.Description: One of the mushroom people needs some hardwood to help fix their house after the rainstorm.
Quests.ReactionText: Great! Now I just need some fiber

Quests.Name: first_rebuild2
Quests.Title: First Villager Rebuild
Quests.Description: The same villager also needs some fiber to help fix their house.
Quests.ReactionText: This is perfect! Thank you so much! Here's something for your help! Maybe you can go assist someone else!

Quests.Name: second_rebuild1
Quests.Title: Second Villager Rebuild
Quests.Description: Another mushroom villager needs some stone to help fix their house.
Quests.ReactionText: Great! Now I could really use some fiber

Quests.Name: second_rebuild2
Quests.Title: Second Villager Rebuild
Quests.Description: This other mushroom villager also needs fiber to help fix their house.
Quests.ReactionText: Sweet! I just realized I need some coal as well...

Quests.Name: second_rebuild3
Quests.Title: Second Villager Rebuild
Quests.Description: They also need coal as well.
Quests.ReactionText: Awesome, that's everything I need! I found these laying around, and I have no use for them. Here you go! Also, I hear the chief could use some assistance.

Quests.Name: chief_rebuild1
Quests.Title: Chief Rebuild
Quests.Description: The Mushroom Chief needs iron bars to help rebuild his house.
Quests.Objective: Gather 10 iron bars for the chief.
Quests.ReactionText: Perfect! I now need some gold ore.

Quests.Name: chief_rebuild2
Quests.Title: Chief Rebuild
Quests.Description: The Mushroom Chief needs gole ore as well.
Quests.Objective: Gather 5 gold ore for the chief.
Quests.ReactionText: This is just what I was looking for! Just need a couple battery packs and I should be all set.

Quests.Name: chief_rebuild3
Quests.Title: Chief Rebuild
Quests.Description: The Chief just needs a couple battery packs and he'll be all set.
Quests.Objective: Gather 2 battery packs for the chief.
Quests.ReactionText: Perfect! You've been so helpful, I want to give you something special for all the hard work you've done.

OfferDetails.Text: Hiya @,^ I'm sure you noticed there was a massive rainstorm last night. There was a landslide east of the bath house and a new area opened up. I've been interested in investigating it for a long time. I was wondering if you could help me out and investigate for me? If you could also bring me back any soil or mushroom samples that would be really great!^ Thanks,^Maru
